original_title: His Name Was Jason: A Friday the 13th Fan Film
overview: Crystal Lake, 1983. Three high school buddies decide to hunt a legendary buck the town locals have named "Buster" to bring back a good name for the town after the Pamela Voorhees murders. Little do they know, but the hunters become the hunted when they stumble into Jason Voorhees' stomping grounds
tagline: A Mother's Love Will Never Die...
title: His Name Was Jason: A Friday the 13th Fan Film
